name: hoverpad
description: Allows the user to make quick notes by clicking a button and entering text into the resulting popup. The notes are saved in storage and sync across profiles. See https://developer.mozilla.org/Add-ons/WebExtensions/Examples#hoverpad

scripts.build: rm -fr hoverpad.js web-ext-artifacts/ www/ && elm-make Main.elm --output=www/hoverpad.js && cp -r manifest.json *.js *.css icons index.html www/
scripts.chrome-web-ext: npm run build && ./scripts/chrome-manifest.js && chromium-browser --pack-extension=$PWD/www/ --pack-extension-key=$PWD/hoverpad.pem && mv www.crx hoverpad.crx
scripts.chrome-store-zip: rm -fr hoverpad.zip && npm run build && ./scripts/chrome-manifest.js && (cd www/ && zip -r ../hoverpad.zip *)
scripts.fx-web-ext: npm run build && rm -fr www/electron.js www/js/ && web-ext build -s www && unzip -l web-ext-artifacts/*.zip
scripts.electron-packager: electron-packager --out electron-apps/ --overwrite --platform=darwin,linux,win32 --ignore="(www|elm-stuff|platforms|plugins|icons)" ./ hoverpad && cd electron-apps/ && for i in */; do zip -r "${i%/}.zip" "$i"; done
scripts.cordova-emulate-android: npm run build && cordova emulate android
scripts.cordova-android: npm run build && cordova run android
scripts.web-ext-sources: rm -fr Hoverpad-Sources.zip && zip -r Hoverpad-Sources.zip Main.elm background.js elm-package.json encryption.js index.html Makefile manifest.json package.json ports.js README.md style.css icons/

author: Storage team
